english.segment1: I hate airports, I know they hate me. I know they jade me and that's my point. I hate airports, I know they hate me. I know they jade me and that's my point

english.segment3: Lax to BNA. A layover in ORD. TSA, you're too extreme. Send me home to YYZ.
